name: Hide/Remove Text
author: Trive Technology B.V.

sections.description: Easily hide/remove e-mails, urls, phone numbers and other text from your users. The actual text is never removed; it is just hidden from website visitors.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin, unzip it and move the unzipped folder to the ‚Äúwp-content/plugins‚Äù directory in your WordPress installation.
  2. In your admin panel, go to Plugins and you‚Äôll find Hide/Remove Text in the plugins section.
  3. Click on the ‚ÄòActivate‚Äô button to use your new plugin right away.
  4. Go to ‘Settings’ and then to ‘Hide/Remove Text’ to configure the plugin.
  5. Done üôÇ
